Description: Verify all required form fields are present and correctly configured
Expected Result: All 6 fields (Name Email Phone Subject Message bot-field) visible with correct IDs
Actual Result: All fields present and correctly configured

Description: Verify HTML5 validation attributes are properly implemented
Expected Result: Required fields have required attribute email field has type=email

Description: Verify all subject dropdown options are available
Expected Result: 8 subject options including 3 booking-specific options
Notes: Options: General Consulting Coaching + 3 booking types

Description: Verify query parameters automatically pre-select subject dropdown
Expected Result: Subject dropdown auto-selects when URL has ?subject= parameter

Description: Verify all Netlify Forms attributes are correctly configured
Expected Result: Form has data-netlify=true method=POST action with trailing slash

Description: Verify honeypot field is present and hidden
Expected Result: bot-field exists and is hidden from human users

Description: Verify form redirects to success page on submission
Expected Result: Form submission redirects to /contact-success/ page
Notes: Trailing slash required for Astro routing

Description: Verify all form fields have user-friendly placeholders
Expected Result: All fields have helpful placeholders with examples

Description: Verify header navigation adapts correctly to screen size
Expected Result: Desktop shows horizontal nav mobile shows hamburger menu

Description: Verify contact form layout adapts to different screen sizes
Expected Result: Desktop 2-column layout mobile single-column stack

Description: Verify footer layout adapts across breakpoints
Expected Result: Mobile 1 column tablet 2 columns desktop 4 columns

Description: Verify typography scales appropriately for different screen sizes
Expected Result: H1 scales from 32px (mobile) to 60px (desktop)

Description: Verify images scale correctly and maintain aspect ratio
Expected Result: All images responsive with w-full h-auto

Description: Verify interactive elements meet 44px minimum touch target size
Expected Result: All tap targets >= 44x44px for mobile accessibility

Description: Verify no horizontal scrolling occurs on any device
Expected Result: Body width <= viewport width at all breakpoints

Description: Verify content is readable at all screen sizes
Expected Result: Line length 60-75 chars font size >= 16px

Description: Verify maintenance page file exists and is accessible
Expected Result: /public/maintenance.html exists and loads at direct URL

Description: Verify all essential elements are present on maintenance page
Expected Result: Logo heading subtitle contact info favicon all present

Description: Verify maintenance page is responsive on all devices
Expected Result: Page adapts to mobile tablet desktop

Description: Verify static assets remain accessible during maintenance mode
Expected Result: Images and favicon accessible when maintenance active

Description: Verify maintenance mode can be easily activated/deactivated
Expected Result: Uncomment 5 lines in netlify.toml activates maintenance

Description: Verify maintenance page can be tested without activating
Expected Result: Direct URL access works without site-wide redirect

Description: Verify branch contexts are defined in netlify.toml
Expected Result: staging and production contexts exist in config

Description: Verify main branch deploys to production domain
Expected Result: Push to main triggers deploy to https://x4o.co.za

Description: Verify staging branch deploys to preview URL
Expected Result: Push to staging triggers deploy to staging subdomain

Description: Verify Git workflow prevents direct commits to main
Expected Result: All changes go through staging → PR → main

Description: Verify staging and production deploy independently
Expected Result: Staging push does not trigger production deploy

Description: Verify maintenance mode can differ per branch
Expected Result: Staging can be active while production in maintenance

Description: Verify Pull Requests generate preview URLs
Expected Result: PR from staging to main creates preview URL

Description: Verify root domain resolves to Netlify IP
Expected Result: x4o.co.za resolves to 75.2.60.5

Description: Verify WWW subdomain has correct CNAME record
Expected Result: www.x4o.co.za → x4oconsultants.netlify.app

Description: Verify WWW redirects to non-WWW with 301
Expected Result: www.x4o.co.za → https://x4o.co.za (301)

Description: Verify SSL certificate is valid and auto-renewing
Expected Result: Valid Let's Encrypt cert for both domains

Description: Verify Google Workspace MX records unchanged
Expected Result: 5 Google MX records at correct priorities

Description: Verify custom branded 404 page displays
Expected Result: Invalid URL shows custom 404.astro page

Description: Verify DNS changes propagated globally
Expected Result: DNS resolves correctly from global servers

Description: Verify modern web features have broad browser support
Expected Result: Flexbox Grid backdrop-filter support >= 95%

Description: Verify forms work identically across all browsers
Expected Result: Form submission works on Chrome Firefox Safari Edge

Description: Verify navigation works on desktop and mobile browsers
Expected Result: Dropdown menus and hamburger menu functional
Notes: CSS hover and JS click events

Description: Verify glassmorphism displays correctly or degrades gracefully
Expected Result: backdrop-filter works or falls back to solid background

Description: Verify Inter font loads correctly across browsers
Expected Result: Google Fonts Inter displays consistently

Description: Verify ES6 JavaScript executes without errors
Expected Result: Mobile menu toggle and query pre-fill work

Description: Verify PNG JPG SVG render correctly across browsers
Expected Result: All image formats display without issues

Description: Verify responsive breakpoints trigger consistently
Expected Result: Breakpoints work identically across browsers

Description: Verify proper HTML5 semantic structure
Expected Result: html lang header main footer landmarks present

Description: Verify proper heading hierarchy (single H1 logical order)
Expected Result: Single H1 per page no skipped heading levels

Description: Verify color contrast meets WCAG AA requirements
Expected Result: All text >= 4.5:1 contrast ratio

Description: Verify form inputs have associated labels and ARIA
Expected Result: All inputs have label for attributes required marked

Description: Verify all interactive elements are keyboard accessible
Expected Result: Tab reaches all elements focus indicators visible

Description: Verify all images have descriptive alt text
Expected Result: All img elements have alt attribute

Description: Verify interactive elements have ARIA labels
Expected Result: Logo links mobile toggle social links have aria-label

Description: Verify link purpose is clear from link text alone
Expected Result: No click here links descriptive link text

Description: Verify text can be resized without breaking layout
Expected Result: Browser zoom to 200% maintains layout and readability

Description: Verify skip-to-content link for keyboard users
Expected Result: Skip link visible on focus before header

Description: Run Lighthouse audit in desktop mode
Expected Result: Performance >= 95 Accessibility >= 85 Best Practices >= 95 SEO >= 95

Description: Run Lighthouse audit in mobile mode
Expected Result: Performance >= 90 Accessibility >= 85 Best Practices >= 95 SEO >= 95

Description: Verify Core Web Vitals are in green zone
Expected Result: FCP < 1.8s LCP < 2.5s CLS < 0.1 TBT < 200ms

Description: Verify pages load quickly on production
Expected Result: All pages load < 3s on fast 3G

Description: Run npm audit to check for known CVEs in all 896 dependencies
Expected Result: No vulnerabilities found across all dependencies
Notes: Run monthly in CI/CD pipeline. All packages up-to-date. Automated script execution passes.

Description: Verify HTTP requests automatically redirect to HTTPS
Expected Result: HTTP automatically redirects to HTTPS with 301/302 status
Actual Result: Automatic HTTPS redirect via Netlify platform

Description: Verify SSL certificate is valid not expired and issued by trusted CA
Expected Result: Valid SSL certificate from Let's Encrypt not expired
Notes: Let's Encrypt via Netlify. Auto-renewal configured.

Description: Check for X-Frame-Options header to prevent clickjacking
Expected Result: Header present with value DENY or SAMEORIGIN
Notes: FIX IMPLEMENTED: public/_headers created with X-Frame-Options: DENY. Awaiting deployment to production. Will pass after deploy.

Description: Verify Content-Security-Policy header is configured
Expected Result: CSP header present with appropriate directives
Notes: FIX IMPLEMENTED: public/_headers created with full CSP policy. Awaiting deployment to production. Will pass after deploy.

Description: Check for X-Content-Type-Options header to prevent MIME-sniffing
Expected Result: Header present with value nosniff
Notes: FIX IMPLEMENTED: public/_headers created with X-Content-Type-Options: nosniff. Awaiting deployment. Will pass after deploy.

Description: Verify X-XSS-Protection header for legacy browser protection
Expected Result: Header present with value 1; mode=block
Notes: FIX IMPLEMENTED: public/_headers created with X-XSS-Protection: 1; mode=block. Awaiting deployment. Will pass after deploy.

Description: Check for Referrer-Policy header to control referrer information
Expected Result: Header present with appropriate policy
Notes: FIX IMPLEMENTED: public/_headers created with Referrer-Policy: strict-origin-when-cross-origin. Awaiting deployment. Will pass after deploy.

Description: Verify Permissions-Policy header restricts browser features
Expected Result: Header present restricting unnecessary features
Notes: FIX IMPLEMENTED: public/_headers created with Permissions-Policy. Awaiting deployment to production. Will pass after deploy.

Description: Verify Strict-Transport-Security header is present
Expected Result: HSTS header present with max-age directive
Notes: Netlify default configuration. Forces HTTPS. Automated script execution passes.

Description: Verify honeypot field is present and hidden from users
Expected Result: Hidden bot-field input present in form HTML
Notes: Netlify Forms honeypot. Catches automated bots.

Description: Verify HTML5 required attribute prevents empty submission
Expected Result: Browser prevents submission if required fields empty

Description: Verify email field validates format using HTML5 type=email
Expected Result: Browser shows validation error for invalid email format
Notes: Native browser validation for email format.

Description: Test XSS vulnerability by injecting script tags in form fields
Expected Result: Script does not execute content is sanitized
Actual Result: Netlify sanitizes input no script execution

Description: Test for reflected XSS by injecting scripts in URL parameters
Expected Result: Script does not execute in browser

Description: Review all client-side JavaScript for unsafe DOM manipulation
Expected Result: No unsafe DOM manipulation (innerHTML eval etc)
Actual Result: No innerHTML or eval() usage detected
Notes: Code review passed. Safe DOM practices.

Description: Test XSS via inline event handlers in form submissions
Expected Result: Script does not execute via event handlers

Description: Verify Netlify Forms generates and validates CSRF tokens
Expected Result: Form submissions include valid CSRF token

Description: Attempt form submission from external origin
Expected Result: Cross-origin submission rejected by server

Description: Verify no HTTP resources loaded on HTTPS pages
Expected Result: No mixed content warnings in browser console
Notes: All external resources use HTTPS (Google Fonts etc).

Description: Test if site can be embedded in malicious iframe
Expected Result: Page refuses to load in iframe due to X-Frame-Options

Description: Verify target=_blank links have rel=noopener noreferrer
Expected Result: All external links have correct rel attribute
Notes: Code review passed. All external links secure.

Description: Check 404 page for sensitive information disclosure
Expected Result: Custom 404 page with no sensitive data exposed

Description: Search codebase and Git history for exposed API keys
Expected Result: No API keys found in code or repository
Actual Result: No API keys found in code or repo
Notes: Code review and Git history scan passed.

Description: Check for database connection strings or credentials
Expected Result: No database credentials (N/A for static site)
Notes: N/A - Static site has no database.

Description: Verify only intentional contact emails are public
Expected Result: Only public contact emails visible (info@x4o.co.za)
Notes: Expected behavior. Contact email is meant to be public.

Description: Attempt to access directory listings (e.g. /images/)
Expected Result: Directory listing blocked (403 or 404 error)

Description: Check if .git directory or source maps are accessible
Expected Result: Source code expected for static site (public repo)
Notes: Static site - source visibility is expected.

Description: Verify A record points to correct Netlify load balancer
Expected Result: A record points to 75.2.60.5 (Netlify)
Notes: Correctly configured via DNS registrar. Automated script execution passes.

Description: Verify www CNAME points to Netlify deployment
Expected Result: CNAME www.x4o.co.za → x4oconsultants.netlify.app
Notes: Correctly configured via DNS registrar. Automated script execution passes.

Description: Verify www subdomain redirects to non-www with 301
Expected Result: 301 permanent redirect from www to non-www
Notes: Configured in netlify.toml redirects section. Automated script has false negative - manual verification confirms passing.

Description: Verify Google Workspace MX records are correctly configured
Expected Result: Google Workspace MX records present and valid
Actual Result: Correct MX records for email service
Notes: Email service secured via Google Workspace. Automated script execution passes.

Description: Attempt SQL injection in all form fields
Expected Result: Not applicable - no database backend
Notes: N/A - Static site has no database to inject into.

Description: Attempt command injection via form inputs
Expected Result: Not applicable - no server-side code execution
Notes: N/A - Static site has no command execution.

Description: Test for malicious file upload vulnerabilities
Expected Result: Not applicable - no file upload feature
Notes: N/A - Static site has no file upload capability.

Description: Test for template injection vulnerabilities
Expected Result: Not applicable - static generation at build time
Actual Result: Astro builds static HTML at build time

Description: Verify only modern TLS versions are supported (1.2 1.3)
Expected Result: TLS 1.2 and 1.3 only (no older versions)

Description: Verify complete and valid certificate chain
Expected Result: Complete valid certificate chain with intermediates

Description: Verify Perfect Forward Secrecy is enabled
Expected Result: Perfect Forward Secrecy enabled on server

Description: Test form rate limiting by rapid submissions
Expected Result: Form submissions rate limited by platform

Description: Verify all form inputs are sanitized server-side
Expected Result: All inputs sanitized before storage

Description: Verify form redirects to success page after submission
Expected Result: Redirect to /contact-success/ after submission
Notes: Prevents form resubmission via browser back button.

Description: Verify custom 404 page loads for non-existent URLs
Expected Result: Custom 404 page displays correctly
